remarks: Lemma for ~ irrapx1 .  Divides the unit interval into ` B ` half-open sections and using the pigeonhole principle ~ fphpdo finds two multiples of ` A ` in the same section mod 1.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2014.)
statement:
irrapxlem1 $p |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. NN ) -> E. x e. ( 0 ... B ) E. y e. ( 0 ... B ) ( x < y /\ ( |_ ` ( B x. ( ( A x. x ) mod 1 ) ) ) = ( |_ ` ( B x. ( ( A x. y ) mod 1 ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
